languages.text: "Видит Великий, шерин, я изо всех сил старалась избавить вас от лишних хлопот с печатями для Меркатум Табула Официале! Даже показала этой служительнице с характером сквернее песчаной бури грамоту с вашей подписью. Но канцлер лишь продолжила отбиваться плетью необоснованных отказов! Сдается мне, дело вовсе не в моей скромной персоне".

traits.locale_text: "Видит Великий, шерин, я изо всех сил старалась избавить вас от лишних хлопот с печатями для Меркатум Табула Официале! Даже показала этой служительнице с характером сквернее песчанной бури грамоту с вашей подписью. Но канцлер лишь продолжила отбивается плетью необоснованных отказов! Сдается мне, дело вовсе не в моей скромной персоне".

languages.text: "As the Exalted One is my witness, shereen, I've tried everything I could to spare you any unnecessary headache over the seals for the Mercatum Tabula Officiale! I even showed this aide with a temper worse than a sandstorm the certificate with your signature. But your chancellor merely kept batting me away with her flail of baseless denials! I suspect that the reason for this has nothing to do with my humble personage."
languages.original_text: "Видит Великий, шерин, я изо всех сил старалась избавить вас от лишних хлопот с печатями для Меркатум Табула Официале! Даже показала этой служительнице с характером сквернее песчаной бури грамоту с вашей подписью. Но канцлер лишь продолжила отбиваться плетью необоснованных отказов! Сдается мне, дело вовсе не в моей скромной персоне".

I even showed this aide with a temper worse than a sandstorm the certificate with your signature. But your chancellor merely kept batting me away with her flail of baseless denials! I suspect that the reason for this has nothing to do with my humble personage."

"As the Exalted One is my witness, shereen, I've tried everything I could to spare you any unnecessary headache over the seals for the Mercatum Tabula Officiale! I even showed this aide with a temper worse than a sandstorm the certificate with your signature. But your chancellor merely kept batting me away with her flail of baseless denials! I suspect that the reason for this has nothing to do with my humble personage."

"As the Exalted One is my witness, shereen, I've tried everything I could to spare you any unnecessary headache over the seals for the Mercatum Tabula Officiale! I even showed this aide with a temper worse than a sandstorm the certificate with your signature. But your chancellor merely kept batting me away with her flail of baseless denials! I suspect that the reason for this has nothing to do with my humble personage."

languages.text: « L'Exalté m'en est témoin, shereen... J'aurai tout essayé pour vous éviter des migraines inutiles au sujet de la Mercatum Tabula Officiale ! J'ai même présenté à cette personne, à l'humeur pour le moins tapageuse, le certificat portant votre signature, mais votre chancelière a persisté à me repousser de ses dénégations sans fondement ! Je suspecte d'ailleurs que la raison de ses agissements n'a rien à voir avec mon humble personne... »
languages.original_text: "As the Exalted One is my witness, shereen, I've tried everything I could to spare you any unnecessary headache over the seals for the Mercatum Tabula Officiale! I even showed this aide with a temper worse than a sandstorm the certificate with your signature. But your chancellor merely kept batting me away with her flail of baseless denials! I suspect that the reason for this has nothing to do with my humble personage."

traits.locale_text: « L'Exalté m'en est témoin, shereen... J'aurai tout essayé pour vous éviter des migraines inutiles au sujet de la Mercatum Tabula Officiale ! J'ai même présenté à cette personne, à l'humeur pour le moins tapageuse, le certificat portant votre signature, mais votre chancelière a persisté à me repousser de ses dénégations sans fondement ! Je suspecte d'ailleurs que la raison de ses agissements n'a rien à voir avec mon humble personne... »

languages.text: “愿至高无上的神皇为我作证，亲爱的。我已经尽我所能，不要因为帝国官方行商执照盖章的事情让你头疼。我甚至给你这位脾气比沙尘暴还坏的助手看了你亲笔签名的证书，可你的宰相一直在毫无根据否认我说的一切，想把我赶走。我猜，这肯定和我卑微的出身没有任何关系吧。”
languages.original_text: "As the Exalted One is my witness, shereen, I've tried everything I could to spare you any unnecessary headache over the seals for the Mercatum Tabula Officiale! I even showed this aide with a temper worse than a sandstorm the certificate with your signature. But your chancellor merely kept batting me away with her flail of baseless denials! I suspect that the reason for this has nothing to do with my humble personage."

traits.locale_text: “愿至高无上的神皇为我作证，亲爱的。我已经尽我所能，不要因为帝国官方行商执照盖章的事情让你头疼。我甚至给你这位脾气比沙尘暴还坏的助手看了你亲笔签名的证书，可你的宰相一直在毫无根据否认我说的一切，想把我赶走。我猜，这肯定和我卑微的出身没有任何关系吧。”

languages.text: "Der Erhabene soll meine Zeuge sein, Shereen, ich habe alles getan, was ich konnte, um Euch keine unnötige Kopfschmerzen wegen der Siegel für die Mercatum Tabula Officiale zu bereiten! Ich habe sogar dieser Bediensteten mit einem Temperament schlimmer als ein Sandsturm die Beglaubigung mit Eurer Unterschrift gezeigt. Doch Eure Kanzlerin hat mich immer wieder mit ihrem Dreschflegel haltloser Ablehnungen abgewehrt! Ich vermute, dass der Grund hierfür nichts mit meiner bescheidenen Persönlichkeit zu tun hat."
languages.original_text: "As the Exalted One is my witness, shereen, I've tried everything I could to spare you any unnecessary headache over the seals for the Mercatum Tabula Officiale! I even showed this aide with a temper worse than a sandstorm the certificate with your signature. But your chancellor merely kept batting me away with her flail of baseless denials! I suspect that the reason for this has nothing to do with my humble personage."

traits.locale_text: "Der Erhabene soll meine Zeuge sein, Shereen, ich habe alles getan, was ich konnte, um Euch unnötige Kopfschmerzen wegen der Siegel für die Mercatum Tabula Officiale zu bereiten! Ich habe sogar dieser Bediensteten mit einem Temperament schlimmer als ein Sandsturm die Beglaubigung mit Eurer Unterschrift gezeigt. Doch Eure Kanzlerin hat mich immer wieder mit ihrem Dreschflegel haltloser Ablehnungen abgewehrt! Ich vermute, dass der Grund hierfür nichts mit meiner bescheidenen Persönlichkeit zu tun hat."

languages.text: «Al Exaltado ponto por testigo, shereen, ¡he intentado todo lo que he podido para librarle del quebradero de cabeza que son los sellos para la Mercatum Tabula Officiale! Hasta le he mostrado este certificado con su firma a esta asistente con un temperamento de mil demonios. Pero ¡su canciller no deja de rechazármelo con negaciones infundadas! Supongo que la razón de esto no tiene nada que ver con mi persona».
languages.original_text: "As the Exalted One is my witness, shereen, I've tried everything I could to spare you any unnecessary headache over the seals for the Mercatum Tabula Officiale! I even showed this aide with a temper worse than a sandstorm the certificate with your signature. But your chancellor merely kept batting me away with her flail of baseless denials! I suspect that the reason for this has nothing to do with my humble personage."

traits.locale_text: «Dado que el Exaltado es mi testigo, shereen, ¡he intentado todo lo que he podido para librarle del quebradero de cabeza que son los sellos para la Mercatum Tabula Officiale! Hasta le he mostrado este certificado con su firma a esta asistente con un temperamento de mil demonios. Pero ¡su canciller no deja de rechazármelo con negaciones infundadas! Supongo que la razón de esto no tiene nada que ver con mi gran humildad».

languages.text: 「エグザルテッド・ワンがあたしの証人よ、シャリーン。あたしはメルカトゥム・タビュラ・オフィシャルの印章に関する不要な頭痛をあなたに与えないために、できる限りのことをしたの！あたしはあなたの署名の入った認証書すら、砂嵐よりも荒々しい気性の補佐官に見せたんだから。だけど、あなたの宰相は根拠のない否定を繰り返したわ！あたしの謙遜な人柄とは何の関係もない理由があるんじゃないかしら」
languages.original_text: "As the Exalted One is my witness, shereen, I've tried everything I could to spare you any unnecessary headache over the seals for the Mercatum Tabula Officiale! I even showed this aide with a temper worse than a sandstorm the certificate with your signature. But your chancellor merely kept batting me away with her flail of baseless denials! I suspect that the reason for this has nothing to do with my humble personage."

traits.locale_text: 「エグザルテッド・ワンがあたしの証人よ、シャリーン。あたしはメルカトゥム・タビュラ・オフィシャルの印章に関する不要な頭痛をあなたに与えないために、できる限りのことをしたの！あたしはあなたの署名の入った認証書すら、砂嵐よりも荒々しい気性の補佐官に見せたんだから。だけど、あなたの宰相は根拠のない否定を繰り返したわ！あたしの謙遜な人柄とは何の関係もない理由があるんじゃないかしら」

languages.text: "Görkemli şahidim olsun şirinim, Mercatum Tabula Officiale mühürleri yüzünden gereksiz yere başın ağrımasın diye elimden geleni yaptım ben! Hatta bu huyu da suyu da bozuk emir erine, imzanı attığın tasdiknameyi bile gösterdim. Şansölyen ise asılsız sebeplerle talebimi reddederek beni geçiştirmeye çalışıyor! Bunun bendenizle bir ilgisi olduğunu sanmıyorum."
languages.original_text: "As the Exalted One is my witness, shereen, I've tried everything I could to spare you any unnecessary headache over the seals for the Mercatum Tabula Officiale! I even showed this aide with a temper worse than a sandstorm the certificate with your signature. But your chancellor merely kept batting me away with her flail of baseless denials! I suspect that the reason for this has nothing to do with my humble personage."

traits.locale_text: "Görkemli şahidim olsun şirinim, Mercatum Tabula Officiale mühürleri yüzünden gereksiz yere başın ağrımasın diye elimden geleni yaptım ben! Hatta bu huyu, suyu bozuk emir erine imzanı attığın tasdiknameyi bile gösterdim. Şansölyen ise asılsız sebeplerle talebimi reddederek beni geçiştirmeye çalışıyor sadece! Sanırım bunun bendenizle bir ilgisi yok."
